MAKING ESTATE PLANNING SIMPLE, SMART & ACCESSIBLE
Easily plan and share your estate, recieve useful insights of your current estate plan and real time solutions to loopholes identified.
Plan my Legacy
Go to your 'nudges' and based on the issue, resolve the issue instantly through the platform or recieve directions on how to resolve the issue
Fill in your family and financial information all at one (overachiever) or overtime at your leasuire (no pressure)
As you fill in your information, based on what you fill in you will get 'nudged' on identified gaps.
Easily Sign up and complete your personal profile.
Instantly and easily access all your information provided. In a neatly created dashboard, get insights into your finances in one place!
Instantly share a read only version of your estate information to your advisor or loved one.
Where a gap is identified in your estate plan, you also recieve insight on how to resolve the issue.
Where a possible pitfall is identified, you will get an alert on the potential pitfall in your estate plan.
Recieve personalised solutions on gaps in your estate plan
Recieve alerts on possible gaps in your estate plan
Access to a summary of your current estate plan
Share your estate plan
WHAT FEATURES WE CURRENTLY HAVE
HOW IT WORKS
SECURITY

We understand the nature of the data collected and take the necessary steps to secure all your data to the best of our abilities. At all times the data belongs to you and can be deleted by you.

We will never at any point sell your data to any third party and do not use the data for any other purpose than to fulfill the functions of the platform.
